definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: PROFIT-An archaic word no longer in use.
Nowadays, the traditional crafts of bamboo hat has endangered lost.
sentences.chinese: 花竹帽這項傳統手工藝如今瀕臨失傳。

sentences.english: However, the Indian Sanskrit versions have been largely lost with few remaining.
sentences.chinese: 印度的梵文經典已經散佚失傳了，殘留下來的很少。

sentences.english: With the extinction of a language, an entire culture is lost.
sentences.chinese: 一旦語言滅絕，全部文化也將就此失傳。

sentences.english: After that, the Chen-style Changquan 108 Forms was lost in Chen's family.
sentences.chinese: 從此，陳氏108式長拳在陳氏家族中就漸漸失傳了。

sentences.english: The some acupuncture treatments that disappeared more than 2000 years ago have been rediscovered, and are being used today.
sentences.chinese: 砭石療法已失傳兩千年了，如今又被人們重新發現。

sentences.english: I worry that is how the traditional styles will be lost.
sentences.chinese: 我擔心傳統武術會慢慢失傳。

sentences.english: They have recently restored a technique that has been lost for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 他們最近找回了失傳已久的技術。

sentences.english: For one reason or other, phoenix painting art of the Chinese school has bordered on the extinction.
sentences.chinese: 由於種種原因，華派鳳畫已瀕臨失傳的危險。

sentences.english: With the development of modern industry, many of the traditional crafts have died out.
sentences.chinese: 隨着現代工業的發展，很多傳統工藝已失傳了。

sentences.english: Teaching is not a lost art, but the regard for it is a lost tradition. ~Jacques Barzun
sentences.chinese: 教學這門藝術並未失傳，但崇尚教學的傳統已經失落。

sentences.english: To re-discover many lost classical documents.
sentences.chinese: 再現了許多已失傳的典籍。

sentences.english: All copies of the original collection of laws werethought to have been lost.
sentences.chinese: 人們以爲所有原始的手稿復件都失傳了。

sentences.english: But there are 30 other traditional instruments that we've already lost.
sentences.chinese: 但是另外還有30種傳統樂器已經失傳了。

sentences.english: It is a pity that this novel has been lost to the world.
sentences.chinese: 這本詞話現在已經失傳了，真是可惜。

sentences.english: Charpter four, the reasons of Humai's closed-disappearance and inheritance protection.
sentences.chinese: 第四章，呼麥藝術瀕臨失傳的原因及傳承保護。

definition: to carry on as before/to follow (an old custom etc)
to pass on (to future generations)/passed on (from former times)/a continued tradition/an inheritance
to be destroyed/to become extinct/to perish/to die out/to destroy/to exterminate
